content: estuary shawl 3 © tin can knits 2013 www tincanknits com key & abbreviations chart notes charts represent rs row only - ws row k2 purl to k - knit co - cast on last 2 sts k2 l h - left hand yo - yarn over p - purl charts are read from right to left m1 - make 1 stitch pm - place marker refer to pattern text and schematic for the order of charts number of chart repeats stitch counts and how r h - right hand k2tog - knit 2 together to adjust finished size by working more or less repeats rs - right side chart c is shown alongside charts e f g for clarity ssk - slip slip knit st s - stitch es during knitting but it is identical in each place chart k3tog - knit 3 sts together ws - wrong side b is not required in this version it was used in a previously published version of pattern sl1-k2tog-psso - slip 1 st k2tog where segments of charts are shaded this indicates pass slipped stitch over additional repeats of pattern or chart shown for clarity sl2-k2tog-p2sso - slip 2 sts k2tog pass 2 slipped stitches over decrease chart g - work row 1-20 once work row 21-40 four times section charts work row 41-60 once chart c - repeat row 1-40 edge st edge sts 7 st repeat 7 st repeat edge sts 13 st repeat edge sts worked twice even chart f - work row 1-20 four times chart c - repeat row 1-40 section charts second repeat of chart f shown for clarity only edge st edge sts 7 st repeat edge sts 13 st repeat edge sts worked twice 4
